comment: If hypertension, then add OBLIGATORY daily measurement of blood pressure on HOME + add chart to follow the daily variations of BP.
title: Blood Pressure

comment: If diabetes mellitus, then add OBLIGATORY daily measurement of blood glucose on HOME + add chart to follow the variation.
title: Blood Glucose

comment: If congestive heart failure, then add OBLIGATORY daily body weight measurement. In patients who are not on dialysis, it must not be 3kg or higher than on previous day. Add a chart to follow the variation.
title: Body Weight
info: Always measure either before or after going to toilet in the morning. If your weight is 3kg or higher than usual, speak to your general practitioner to adjust diuretics.
